snippet: Fox Sports 1 appears to be the stiffest competition for ESPN because of the resources of its parent and ambitions of its chairman, but it has a long way to go to match the ESPN empire.
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column notes that Fox Sports 1, which is poised to spring into existence, appears to be the stiffest competition for ESPN because of the resources of its parent and ambitions of its chairman Rupert Murdoch, but it has a long way to go to match the ESPN empire.
lead_paragraph: Fox Sports 1 appears to be the stiffest competition for ESPN because of the resources of its parent and ambitions of its chairman, but it has a long way to go to match the ESPN empire.

headline.main: ESPN Challenger Will Try to Punch Above Its Weight
headline.print_headline: ESPN Challenger Will Try to Punch Above Its Weight
